title: Game Progress Route
content:
You can respond with:

It would seem not. Are you always so suspicious of those who save you? The cult thinks it owns me. I beg to differ. You say you're grateful - but my coinpurse is still light, Thank Tulla - she's the one who set me on your trail.

Select the 5th option and Beldron will start to talk about Wulbren. You'll find out that Wulbren has been taken and the gnomes will wonder what he has gotten himself into now. This will also update a new quest called"Rescue Wulbren". You can respo
